about_the_game:
Crash Course is a fun little Lokal-Multiplayer Indie-Game about crashing into your friends and family in cars, and sabotaging them in a few epic mini games. Who every gets the most amount of coins, wins.

Controls:

  • W/S           RT/LT             - Move

  • A/D            LStick            - Steer

  • Space        a                    - Drift / Jump

Play in 5 different minigames with how many people you want ( all on one machine ). The game is currently goal-less, but you can try beating your friends and earning, as much points as possible, get all achievements, or just explore the world of Crash Course.

Explode your friends in 'Hot Potato', push them off in 'Hexagon Heat', or saboatge them in 'Floor is Hexagon', while staying up as long as possible. Or just try beating them at a normal game of soccer, but with cars.
